text: I’m so happy with everything they’ve launched recently that it’s hard to complain—but I do my best :grimacing:.
Nothing official and no commitments from HubSpot but I do believe that they are working on it and understand that this would be a game changing feature for us.
for realz <@UDHT6N5SM>! I’ll be happy to complain, however, because the squeaky wheel gets the grease :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
ha, <@U3T21PDBK>, I've been squeaky wheeling it too but mostly in the <#C04AY1H2204|cms-react> channel
